articles.title: Deposit grows slower than loan for many banks in June quarter of FY25 - Business Standard
articles.description: Bank of Baroda posted faster growth in advances than in deposits. The loan book of the BoB grew by 1.73 per cent while deposits improved by 1.59 per cent, sequentially
